titles.title: To provide for the boundary of the Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Park to be adjusted, to authorize the donation of land to the United States for addition to that historic park, and for other purposes.

To provide for the boundary of the Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Park to be adjusted, to authorize the donation of land to the United States for addition to that historic park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources
